page.description: Returns name of the parent table.
page.original: &ltTBL>.PARENT_GET() Syntax Alias as C = &ltTBL>.PARENT_GET() Description The &ltTBL>.PARENT_GET() method is used for determining the structure of a set. Returns the Alias of a table's parent table in a set. See <TBL>.CHILD_GET() for examples. See Also Table Functions and Methods, Set Functions and Methods
